targets.query: SELECT mean(from_grid) - mean(to_grid) FROM autogen.http WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT min("grid_status") +1  FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

options.content: Firmware

targets.query: SELECT min("grid_status") FROM "grid"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT min("grid_status") + 2 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = -1 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')
SELECT min("grid_status") + 1 FROM "grid"."http" WHERE grid_status = 0 and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) tz('${tz:text}')

SELECT (home - from_grid) / home FROM 
  (SELECT integral("home")  AS home, integral("from_grid")  AS from_grid 
      FROM "autogen"."http" WHERE $timeFilter)
SELECT fp FROM (SELECT sum("from_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )
SELECT s - (tp + tg) FROM (SELECT sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s,  sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )
SELECT tgg FROM (SELECT sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )

SELECT tgg + (s - tp - tg ) + fp FROM (SELECT sum("to_pw")  * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tp, sum("solar") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS s, sum("to_grid") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS tg, sum("from_pw") * $avg_buy_per_kwh AS fp, sum("to_grid") * $avg_sell_per_kwh AS tgg FROM kwh.http WHERE  $timeFilter )

SELECT  (1+from_solar/abs(from_solar))*from_solar/2  FROM (SELECT integral(solar)/1000/3600 - (integral(to_pw) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  - integral(to_grid)/1000/3600  AS from_solar FROM (SELECT from_solar, solar, to_pw, to_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter ))

SELECT (integral(from_grid) - integral(grid_to_pw))/1000/3600  AS from_grid FROM (SELECT from_grid, ((from_grid - home - solar) + ABS((from_grid - home - solar))) / 2 AS grid_to_pw FROM autogen.http WHERE  $timeFilter )
SELECT last("load_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Home" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT last("solar_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Solar" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT last("site_instant_power")  / 1000 AS "Grid" FROM "raw"."http" WHERE time >= now() - 10m
SELECT sum("from_grid") - sum("to_grid") as "grid" FROM "kwh"."http" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0) tz('${tz:text}')
